catherine leigh schmidt
last updated march 2014

cls / portfolio / 1963

As a part of my internship under Micah Barrett for RISD Media, RISD's PR arm, I made a book for the class of 1963 50th reniunion in the fall of 2013. The book includes a mix of photos from the 1963 yearbook and almni-submited photos.

⤒

This site and all the stuff on it belong to Catherine Leigh Schmidt. This site is hosted by github pages and concocted with jekyll.
